name: Classic Chocolate Mousse
description: Decadent and velvety-rich — the perfect finish for a fine meal.
preparation:
1. Whisk egg yolks with vanilla extract and coffee. Stir into warm chocolate and set aside.
  2. Create meringue by beating egg whites with sugar until soft peaks form.
  3. Using a Corner Spatula, quickly fold whipped cream into chocolate mixture.
  4. Incorporate meringue into chocolate mixture. Pour into individual serving glasses or a large dessert bowl. Chill for 3 hours before serving.
tips:
For a delicious and decorative touch, drizzle the inside of dessert glasses (or bowl) with melted dark chocolate.

Before serving, top each with a single coffee bean.
